javascript.question: What is the result of the following expression: 5 + '10'?
Which keyword is used to declare a constant in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the `setTimeout` function in JavaScript?
options: To execute a function after a specified delay
To set a timer for the page
To delay the execution of the entire script
javascript.correctAnswer: To execute a function after a specified delay

javascript.question: How do you check the type of a variable in JavaScript?
What does the `Array.map` method do in JavaScript?
options: Modifies each element of the array
Creates a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element
Returns the first element of the array
javascript.correctAnswer: Creates a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element
